title: Integrated Curriculum-Based End-of-Life Care Practical Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing skills and comprehension of medical ethics
context.additional_context: Need for Patient-Centered End-of-Life Care Education Incorporating Cultural Sensitivity

learning_goals: Learners can accurately apply end-of-life care techniques for managing physical and emotional symptoms in each stage with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can apply communication strategies that consider cultural differences to real-world cases.
Learners can perform hospice-palliative care team collaboration protocols through role-playing with over 90% proficiency
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
